::WindRider::
He reached the CF after hours of flying, transformed
and landed.He walked through the hatch(OOC:assuming
its still open).He activated his internal scanners.
"Computer", he said, "locate unit Battera."
The computer told him where she was, and he began to
walk down the corridor towards her quarters.
--- Terry Barlow <twb176@...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> WindRider picked up a handful of dirt and let it
> slip
> through his fingers. Many curious had happened to
> him
> this day. He firmly believed that the Matrix had a
> purpose for all bots, and for all things.Did the
> Matrix send him to this planet, to Battera, to show
> him up what his purpose was? Was his true purpose to
> bring this war to an end?He picked up a small stone
> and tossed it across the water. "I guess I got
> plenty
> of time to figure that out", he thought.For now, he
> had more things to discuss with Battera. He
> transformed to beast mode, and flew back towards the
> CF to find her.
>
